Person.Organization: ALFRED I. DU PONT HOSP FOR CHILDREN

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The dataset used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from the database of Genotype and Phenotype (dbGaP) found at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap. Samples and associated genotype and phenotype data for the Genetic Basis of Cryptorchidism were provided by Julia Barthold, M.D.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: In accord with the NIH GWAS Policy for Data Sharing, and as expressed through the submission of the DAR, Approved Users acknowledge the NIH’s expectation that they will not submit findings using the Genetic Basis of Cryptochidism dataset(s), or updated versions thereof, for publication or presentation for a period of exclusivity for Contributing Investigators concluding with the Embargo Date identified on the dbGaP or other NIH genomic data repository homepage

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cryptorchidism, PUB, COL, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CRYPT-PUB-COL-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cryptorchidism. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
